core_concept.description: The single word that defines what this expression represents

technical_specifications.description: Explicit technical specs, dimensions, codes, ratings, tolerances

classification_aliases.description: Full spectrum of valid ways this entity could be referenced using expert-level terminology, from precise to generic

constituent_materials.description: All materials that make up this product, both explicit and standard/typical materials inferred from domain knowledge

manufacturing_processes.description: Both stated and inferred manufacturing processes based on product type, materials, and industry standards

applications.description: Direct and derived applications based on product characteristics
